channel.title: Comments on: About ADAPT
channel.description: Supporting parents and children towards healthy and secure attachments

item.title: By: Christine Gordon
item.dc:creator: Christine Gordon
item.description:
Dear Veronica,
I'm glad you liked the article and yes, we would be happy for you to share it with your adoptive parents. I'm not sure if you want to copy the article or just the link? If the article we would want acknowledgement of it's source. My phone number: 07973333108 if you want to discuss further.
Christine
item.content:encoded:
Dear Veronica,

I’m glad you liked the article and yes, we would be happy for you to share it with your adoptive parents. I’m not sure if you want to copy the article or just the link? If the article we would want acknowledgement of it’s source. My phone number: 07973333108 if you want to discuss further.  

Christine

item.title: By: veronica birch
item.dc:creator: veronica birch
item.description:
I've just read this brilliant article - and I wonder fi I could please have permission to share it with adoptive parents in Somerset, via our newsletter? (I'm an adoption support worker).
Thank you!
item.content:encoded:
I’ve just read this brilliant article – and I wonder fi I could please have permission to share it with adoptive parents in Somerset, via our newsletter? (I’m an adoption support worker).
